unittitle_ssm: Hook family World War I letter and clippings
abstract_ssm: This collection contains a letter from Mary A. Hook to her mother, Katherine E. Hook, describing the grave of her brother, Alfred J. Hook, and the cemetery for the American soldiers killed in Bony (Aisne), France during World War I.
subject_ssm: Soldiers' bodies, Disposition of -- France -- Aisne
collection_ssm: Hook family World War I letter and clippings
heading_ssm: Hook family World War I letter and clippings

subject_sim: Soldiers' bodies, Disposition of -- France -- Aisne
